sentences.literal: Lord Mengchang's name was Wen, and his surname was Tian.
Wen's father was called Lord Jingguo, Tian Ying.

sentences.chinese: 田嬰者，齊威王少子而齊宣王庶弟也。
sentences.literal: Tian Ying, Qi Wei King young son and Qi Xuan King concubine brother.

sentences.chinese: 田嬰自威王時任職用事，與成侯鄒忌及田忌將而救韓伐魏。
sentences.literal: Tian Ying from Wei King time hold office handle affairs, with Cheng Hou Zou Ji and Tian Ji general save Han attack Wei.

sentences.chinese: 成侯與田忌爭寵，成侯賣田忌。
sentences.literal: Cheng Hou with Tian Ji contend favor, Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji.

sentences.chinese: 田忌懼，襲齊之邊邑，不勝，亡走。
sentences.literal: Tian Ji fear, attack Qi border city, not win, flee go.

sentences.chinese: 會威王卒，宣王立，知成侯賣田忌，乃復召田忌以為將。
sentences.literal: Meet Wei King die, Xuan King stand, know Cheng Hou sell out Tian Ji, then again summon Tian Ji as general.

sentences.chinese: 宣王二年，田忌與孫臏、田嬰俱伐魏，敗之馬陵，虜魏太子申而殺魏將龐涓。
sentences.literal: Xuan King two years, Tian Ji with Sun Bin, Tian Ying together attack Wei, defeat at Ma Ling, capture Wei crown prince Shen kill Wei general Pang Juan.

sentences.chinese: 宣王七年，田嬰使於韓、魏，韓、魏服於齊。
sentences.literal: Xuan King seven years, Tian Ying envoy to Han Wei, Han Wei submit to Qi.

sentences.chinese: 嬰與韓昭侯、魏惠王會齊宣王東阿南，盟而去。
sentences.literal: Ying with Han Zhao Hou, Wei Hui King meet Qi Xuan King Dong E south, alliance depart.
Next year, again with Liang Hui King meet Zhen.
This year, Liang Hui King die.
Xuan King nine years, Tian Ying chancellor Qi.

sentences.chinese: 齊宣王與魏襄王會徐州而相王也。
sentences.literal: Qi Xuan King with Wei Xiang King meet Xu Zhou mutually wang.
Chu Wei King hear, angry Tian Ying.
